frameset.edef: to sit relaxed on the roof, to lie down

example.parse: (TOP (FRAG (X (CONJ وَ) (RESTRIC_PART إِلّا))) (UCP (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON الِّي)) (S (ADJP-PRD (ADJ جايِب) (NP (NOUN صاحْب) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ُه)))) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)))) (CONJ وَ) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV يِسطح) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-ADV (NOUN فَوْق) (NP (DET+NOUN القَطْر)))))))
